orig_text:
such as (but not limited to) end users, network ...

including (but not limited to) [RFC7754] on filtering, [RFC7258] ...
correct_text:
such as end users, network ...

including [RFC7754] on filtering, [RFC7258] ...
notes: Remove redundant, faux legalese "(but not limited to)".  Nothing about "such as" and "including" indicates that the following list of examples are exhaustive: just that they are members of a set.
